backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with user profiles, worker profiles, bookings, admin settings, and credential-based admin authentication, integrating storage, authorization, Stripe, and migration mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Handles state upgrade by adding adminCredentials while preserving existing admin sign-in page settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the admin credential sign-in feature and the frontend files involved.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the PWA including service worker registration, manifest links, and root mount element.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, theme colors, icons, and display settings for HandyConnect.
frontend/public/offline.html: Fallback offline page shown when the app has no network connection.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker managing asset caching, offline fallback, and automatic precaching of discovered resources.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers, error handling, and defines public, protected, and admin routes for the application using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminQuery: Displays loading and error UI states for admin queries with optional retry support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleC: Shows a confirmation dialog for granting or revoking admin privileges with optional block warnings.
frontend/src/components/admin/AppSetting: Provides UI for viewing and updating admin app settings and admin sign‑in page customization with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserContro: Allows admins to search users by principal, view results, copy IDs, and inspect user data with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with navigation back to the worker browsing page.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAcco: Gatekeeper component that redirects users without an account type to onboarding after loading.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects routes by verifying admin status and showing an access‑denied screen when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, redirecting to sign‑in if not.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireMain: Blocks access during maintenance mode for non‑admin users and shows a maintenance screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access based on user role and redirects to the correct dashboard if mismatched.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Displays a list of bookings with status, details, and a link to view each booking, or an empty message if none exist.
Renders a status badge with label and variant based on booking status.
frontend/src/components/bookings/CreateB: Form for creating a booking request with date/time, job details, and location inputs.
Provides the main app layout with top navigation, optional payment banner, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/maintenance/Main: Full‑screen maintenance notice with sign‑out functionality.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing links based on account type and admin status, with authentication and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerAv: Displays a worker's avatar image or initials fallback, with size variants.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Worker profile summary card showing avatar, category, details, rate, and link to full profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form for creating or editing a worker profile, including fields, category selection, and image upload validation.
frontend/src/config/subscription.ts: Defines default subscription pricing and helpers for generating shopping items.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountType.ts: Hook that returns the caller's account type and related convenience booleans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for admin checks, admin sign‑in, settings, maintenance mode, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color palettes and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard UI with tabs for user management and application settings.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSignIn.tsx: Implements the admin sign‑in page supporting Internet Identity and credential login with redirects and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetail.tsx: Displays detailed booking information, worker info, and status controls with permission checks and status updates.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseWorkers.tsx: Displays a worker browsing page with category filtering and rate sorting, using worker data from a query hook. Renders a hero section, filters, and a list of active workers.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Shows the client's bookings, separating upcoming and past ones, with a link to browse workers. Uses booking data from a query hook and displays them via BookingList.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingAccountType: Handles multi‑step user onboarding to select role, enter name, and optionally complete payment. Saves profile data, manages Stripe checkout, and handles session persistence.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Displays a payment failure message and allows users to retry onboarding. Clears stored session data and redirects back to onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Verifies Stripe payment, confirms it on the backend, and redirects users based on onboarding state or account type. Handles loading and error states during verification.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Provides a sign‑in screen using Internet Identity; redirects authenticated users to browsing. Shows loading state during login and includes admin sign‑in link.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPaywall.t: Blocks access when a user's grace period ends and prompts for subscription payment. Loads fee details, checks Stripe config, and redirects to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboard.tsx: Displays a worker’s dashboard with profile completeness status and categorized booking lists using worker-specific queries.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDetail.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific worker and allows clients to submit booking requests, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfile.tsx: Provides a form for workers to create or edit their profile, including image upload/removal with progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the HandyConnect app’s architecture, features, and current implementation state.
